name: allenai/dolma
description: Dolma is a colossal corpus of 3 trillion tokens, meticulously compiled from a diverse range of sources including web content, academic publications, code, books, and encyclopedic materials. This dataset serves as a valuable resource for language model pretraining research, offering a comprehensive and extensive view of human language.
citeAs:

  title = {{Dolma: An Open Corpus of Three Trillion Tokens for Language Model Pretraining Research}},
  author = {

    Oyvind Tafjord and Evan Pete Walsh and Hannaneh Hajishirzi and Noah A. Smith and Luke Zettlemoyer and
    Iz Beltagy and Dirk Groeneveld and Jesse Dodge and Kyle Lo
},
  year = {2024},
  journal={arXiv preprint},
}
creator: allenai
keywords: Language Model Pretraining, Corpus, Web Content
